mapper.select: select id,ref_id,ref_group,name,content,indent,TO_CHAR( createdat+9/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as createdat,TO_CHAR( updatedat+9/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as updatedat, user_id, content_id ,(select count(*) from rereply where ref_group = ry.id) as reply_num from rereply ry where ref_group is null OFFSET (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
